content: ***when you re ready to set sail drop your valuables in the tobago bag and go *** this eye-catching crochet purse is made from three colorful motifs sewn together for a cross-body bag that s just big enough to hold your summer essentials sunglasses keys a good book and some sunscreen play around with colors to make a tobago bag for each of your warm-weather getaways *pattern includes tutorial video * **materials** -4 colors one skein each of lion brand truboo sample made in jade creamsicle pink lemonade and ecru substitute any comparable worsted #4 weight yarn - plant fibers like linen or cotton are recommended -3 5mm and 4mm crochet hooks -scissors -tapestry needle -blocking supplies -2 - 15mm wooden beads optional **techniques** -creating a magic_ring -working in the round -basic increasing -color changes -minor tunisian crochet **measurements** one size - 12 at widest point 14 long 13 strap drop // buy more save more // use these codes to save when you buy multiple patterns - saveon3 to save 10% off 3 patterns - saveon5 to save 15% off 5 patterns - saveon8 to save 20% off 8 patterns add all patterns to cart for discount limit one use per purchase
